description: Number of pair-coverings with largest block size 4.
comments: The g.f. (1+5*z+6*z**2+z**3)/(z-1)/(z**2-z-1) conjectured by _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation is probably wrong.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. G. Stanton, J. L. Allston and D. D. Cowan, Pair-coverings with restricted largest block length, Ars Combin., 11 (1981), 85-98.
links: Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
